My Search Engine Optimization Service
Barcelona

Search Engine Optimization Freelancing Service

With Barcelonas Search Engine Optimisation you can increase the organic traffic for your website. It doesn’t matter, if you are located in Girona with a local shop or if you offering a service are business maybe even in the whole barcelona area, SEO Marketing is one of the most effective ways to increase your traffic.

From Backlinks to On-Page SEO

The goal of every search engine optimisation project is to increase the visibility in organic search results. In other words, you don’t to pay for an ad to get traffic, you just optimise your page and if you choose the right keywords, you can get a decent ranking in the Search Engine Result Page (SERP) within a few months.

There are tons of important factors which you have to consider when optimising your page, Google gets smarter every day and the most important thing is, to fullfill the right user intent with your page.

User Intent

What I mean by that is, if you visitor just want a quick information how to get from point a to your shop, don’t start talking about your history. Many SEO’s always say content is king, however this is true if you are able to satisfy the intent of the user. If the user needs comprehend piece of content, like an information about how to change a certain lifestyle, offer him a long and valuable blog post which he love to refer to.

SEO Audit Barcelona

What I do to increase your page ranking is, first of all I analyse your page. I check the User Experience on the Page and the overall feeling I get. Then I check several SEO factors including the following:

  • Page Title
  • H1,H2 Tags
  • Meta Description
  • IMG Tags
  • Page-Speed
  • Responsive Design (Mobile First Index)
  • Content
  • Duplicate or Thin Content
  • 404’S
  • Schema.org
  • Off-Page SEO
  • Bounce-Rate
  • Social-Media
  • Sitemap
  • robots.txt
  • and so on…

This is called an SEO Audit and with this Audit you can get a list of things that should improve your page rank within the SERP’s. With every SEO Audit, I will write down exactly what I will do for you, and I will write down results you can see immediately and results you can hopefully see in the future.

With this type of transparency, you know exactly what you pay for. If you have some questions left, contact me whenever you like.
